short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is assistant for EiE LMS. This app needs authentication to activate it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is for making the eie LMS program better. This is for the academy managers.

---- Features ----
1. Dashboard
 - Added a button that loads all the names of students and teachers.
 - Added searching feature
 - Added sorting feature of class names
 - Added total number of the students searched

2. Navigation Bar
 - Added sub url button.
 - Added redirection button for notice, advice list.
 - relocate the advertisement to prevent user from confusing with the search box.

3. User List
 - Changed the background color to aliceblue for users who are not student.

4. Register User
 - Added register button at the bottom of the page for selecting students.
 - Changed the searching method of selecting students not to refresh the page.

5. Class Management
 - Changed the layout to show names of teachers and students
 - Renewal the design to emphasize the class names
 - Added feature of sorting the class name

6. Renewal many of the layout to look better.
